objects.name: Analytic 0836
objects.description: macOS-specific permission modification behavioral chain: (1) chmod/chown/chflags process execution, (2) System Integrity Protection (SIP) bypass attempts, (3) Extended attribute (xattr) modifications, (4) Unified log correlation with file system events, (5) Subsequent access to previously restricted resources

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: process execution events for chmod, chown, chflags with unusual parameters or targets

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: fs:fsevents
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: file system events indicating permission or attribute changes

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: macOS system paths protected by SIP that should never have permission modifications
chflags parameter combinations indicating evasive behavior (uchg, schg, hidden)
Extended attributes to monitor for unauthorized modifications
Log retention period for correlating permission changes with subsequent access
